coding.display: Advance care planning including the explanation and discussion of advance directives such as standard forms (with completion of such forms, when performed), by the physician or other qualified health care professional; first 30 minutes, face-to-face with the patient, family member(s), and/or surrogate

note.text: Patient voluntarily discussed advance care planning with MDCardio PWAffirmHealth (on behalf of Kristin Cerner Carter) on 12/26/2019 for 16 minutes for an initial discussion.
